study.name: Chicken raw counts
study.description:
Synthetic chicken raw counts v1. Jean Chang, Eric Weitz, Jon Bistline, Eno-Abasi Augustine-Akpan, Devon Bush, Vicky Horst. Journal of SCP Synthetic Studies. Volume 1, p10, October 2020. Assesing the benefits of raw count data for single cell transcriptomics analysis.

Expected study gene expression patterns:

Foo - gradient for 'spatial', top (hi) to bottom (low); gradient for 'cluster', distal (hi) to center (lo)

Bar - A: 2, B: 3, C: 4, D: 5

Baz - gradient for 'spatial', roughly bottom (hi) to top (low); gradient for 'cluster', center (hi) to distal (lo)

Qux: same value (5) for all cells

Reference screenshots of expected visualizations can be found at: https://github.com/broadinstitute/single_cell_portal_core/pull/772
